Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: High five for trying the non-SH outlets! In my experience, that can take serious effort (and is very much worth it). Fwiw, googling “coping skills list” and the Calm Harm app have helped me build my list of outlet/distraction activities.  (And screaming into a pillow sometimes works. Heck, it’s practically a deep breathing exercise.)  Zen hugs <3 I hope you pass safely through this storm.
